div.p: P67/1748, unit 251, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor to submit for your consideration a notice regarding the distribution of plants &c from this establishment during this season. Should it meet with your approval I would recommend its insertion into the Gov Gazette
MS annotation: 'Gazette 19.2.67 JM'. The notice was published in the Government Gazette (no. 22), 22 February 1867, p. 389 (B67.02.04). It appeared also in the issues of 26 February 1867, p. 425 and 1 March 1867, p. 447.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
